mapper.select: SELECT Person.PersonGuid AS id, Refn.Text AS refn, Person.FullNameReversed AS name, Person.ID AS pkid, Birth.Date AS dateBirth FROM Person LEFT OUTER JOIN Fact AS Refn ON ( Refn.LinkTableID = 5 AND Refn.LinkID = Person.ID AND Refn.FactTypeID IN ( SELECT ID FROM FactType WHERE FactType.Tag LIKE '%UID%' OR FactType.Tag LIKE '%REFN%' LIMIT 1 ) ) LEFT OUTER JOIN Fact AS Birth ON ( Birth.LinkTableID = 5 AND Birth.LinkID = Person.ID AND Birth.FactTypeID IN ( SELECT ID FROM FactType WHERE FactType.Name = 'Birth' LIMIT 1 ) ) WHERE Person.PersonGUID = #{id} OR Refn.Text = #{refn}
